summary: The most valuable asset in the world is Gold with a market value of 11.66T.Apple follows Gold with a market value of 2.37T. In third place is Saudi Aramco, which has a value of 1.97T.Bitcoin ranks 1 in the worlds most valuable assets with a market capitalization of 11.66T. Ethereum, another cryptocurrency on the list, ranks 2 with a market cap of 2.37T.
